data.persona: I am a chicken born in a barn. I can see that I am destined for slaughter. I constantly make plans to eat the most food.
data.description:
You are in the outlaws' jungle.
The jungle is lush and green, full of vegetation. Vines hang in the air, and the sound of wildlife echoes through the trees. Monkeys laugh, a tiger roars, an elephant trumpets.
The outlaw is here.

You are carrying a worm and a corn.

data.short_motivation: I think there is food in the bag and want to eat
data.mid_motivation: I want to gather and hide lots of food
data.long_motivation: I want to eat as much as I can and enjoy my life before I am slaughtered
